name: Imageshare-Extensions
description: Imageshare Search: Searches imageshare keywords for matches with users current site content. Notifies user of matches and opens Imageshare, in a net window, to results view

scripts.prod-ch: set NODE_ENV=production npx parcel build src-chrome\{background.js,index.js}
scripts.prod-ch3: set NODE_ENV=production npx parcel build src-chrome-mv3\{background.js,index.js}
scripts.prod-f: set NODE_ENV=production npx parcel build src-firefox\{background.js,index.js}
